title: SAM Score Approximation Project
desc: Station Accessibility Measure (SAM) scores and visualizations for rapid transit stations.

title: Multi-Modal Network Example
desc: Sample dataset for integrated multi-modal transit networks, including bus, subway, and cycling connections.

title: Transit Ridership Trends
desc: Data visualizing annual and monthly ridership for key transit lines and stations from 2010-2023.

title: Active Transportation Paths
desc: Sample layer of cycling lanes, multi-use trails, and pedestrian pathways for assessing non-motorized mobility.

title: Accessibility Index by Station
desc: Example accessibility index for subway and commuter rail stations, highlighting essential services proximity.

title: Census Blocks (2021)
desc: Spatial boundaries and statistics for census blocks from the 2021 Canadian Census.

title: Population & Demographics
desc: Summary tables on population, age, and gender breakdowns by region.

title: Household Income Distribution
desc: Income group distributions and socioeconomic indicators at neighbourhood level.

title: Educational Attainment
desc: Data on highest education levels achieved by residents in different communities.

title: Immigrant Population
desc: Proportion of residents born outside Canada, by census tract and neighbourhood.

title: Public Facilities Inventory
desc: Map and list of all public buildings, community centers, and recreation facilities in the region.

title: Utilities Network
desc: Geospatial layers of electrical grids, water mains, and telecommunications lines.

title: Major Roadways
desc: Dataset of major arterial roads, highways, and expressways, suitable for route and traffic analysis.

title: Bridges Database
desc: Locations and metadata of bridges, including structural type and inspection status.

title: Sewer Networks
desc: Mapping of major sewer and drainage lines for urban areas.

title: Flood Susceptibility Index
desc: Raster index for identifying flood-prone zones based on topography and rainfall data.

title: Temperature Trends
desc: Time series and spatial grids for monthly and annual mean temperature.

title: Precipitation Patterns
desc: Annual and seasonal precipitation maps for long-term trend analysis.

title: Urban Heat Island Map
desc: Locations and magnitude of urban heat islands identified in Canadian cities.

title: Climate Change Vulnerability
desc: Composite vulnerability scores for neighbourhoods to climate hazards.

title: Canadian Index of Multiple Deprivation
desc: Composite measure of deprivation using census and health indicators.

title: Socioeconomic Status Index
desc: Regional mapping of socioeconomic status by income, education, and employment.

title: Environmental Quality Index
desc: Scores for neighbourhood environmental quality, including air and water.

title: Walkability Index
desc: Measures of walkability for different neighbourhoods, integrating sidewalks, connectivity, and services.

title: Health Accessibility Index
desc: Index measuring accessibility to hospitals and health services by public transit.
